meanings.definition: Pressed between rollers to give a smooth, glossy surface.
meanings.sent1: She calendered the fabric to make it shiny.
meanings.sent2: The paper was calendered to achieve a polished finish.
meanings.sent3: The chef calendered the dough to create a perfectly smooth crust.
meanings.sent4: His words were calendered with charm, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The artist calendered the clay, transforming it into a gleaming masterpiece.
